system.effect: Whenever the user trades in a Food Buff from a Berry, flip a coin. On heads, the user gains all the benefits of the Food Buff, but the Buff is not used up. On tails, the Buff is consumed normally. While in Sunny Weather, the Buff is never consumed. The user may trade in a Food Buff up to once per turn during an encounter, but only until they flip “Tails”.
